short_summary: Aviation Replacement Parts for the CC138 Twin Otter
full_summary:
### Aviation Replacement Parts for the CC138 Twin Otter
#### Government Tender Announcement
**Notice Reference Number:** PW-22-01012885  
**Solicitation Number:** W8485-237061/C  
**Publication Date:** 2022-11-08  
**Tender Closing Date:** 2022-11-22T14:00:00

**Procurement Overview**
The Department of National Defence (DND) is soliciting proposals for the Supply Arrangement (SA) W8485-184741 Series to acquire replacement parts for the CC138 Twin Otter aircraft.

**Eligibility**
Only Qualified SA Holders of the W8485-184741 Series are eligible to participate in this tender. The Contracting Authority has invited the following companies to submit a proposal:

* Aero Precision Industries LLC
* B S F (Business Solutions Fasteners) International Inc.
* JHT Defense Inc.
* Patlon Aircraft & Industries Limited
* Simex Defence Inc.
* Tower Aerospace Inc.
* Genaire Limited
* Unisource Technology Inc.
* L3 Technologies MAS Inc.
* Tulmar Safety
* Canada West Avionics
* Mattis Aerospace
* Rockwell Collins Canada
* PAL Aerospace
* Kenn Borek Air

**Request for Proposal**
The Request for Proposal (RFP) documents will be e-mailed directly to the invited SA Holders.

**Inquiries**
Inquiries regarding this RFP should be submitted to:

June Cole
Aerospace Equipment Program Management (DGAEPM)
Department of National Defence (DND) / Government of Canada
455, Boulvard de la carrière, Gatineau (QC) J8Y 6V7
Email: [june.cole@forces.gc.ca](mailto:june.cole@forces.gc.ca)

**Ongoing Opportunity for Qualification**
A Notice will be posted annually on the Government Electronic Tendering Service (GETS) to allow more suppliers to become qualified for the SA W8485-184741 Series.

**Primary Contact**
Samantha Coles
Supply Team Leader
Government of Canada | Public Services and Procurement Canada
Land and Aerospace Equipment Procurement and Support Sector
Civilian Aircraft Division - CAG
Email: [samantha.coles@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:samantha.coles@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)

### Contract Information
* **Trade Agreements:** Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
